ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups cooked regular brown rice or regular long-grain white rice
¾ teaspoon dried oregano leaves, crushed
1 (26 ounce) jar Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce or Prego® Tomato, Basil & Garlic Sauce

cookingTips: Rice grains stick out from meatballs creating the 'porcupine' appearance during cooking
Don't overmix the turkey mixture to keep meatballs tender
Baking in sauce keeps them moist and allows flavors to develop
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain why rice is added to this lean ground turkey and how the cooking method ensures moist, flavorful meatballs instead of dry ones.
